edges.surfaceText: You can use [[a bed]] to [[have sex]]
You can use [[a bed]] to [[sit on]]
[[a bed]] is used for [[covering things on the floor]]
You can use [[a bed]] to [[demonstrate virility]]
[[a bed]] is for [[a person to sleep]]
[[a bed]] is for [[a place to read]]

end.label: relaxing in with a good book

edges.surfaceText: [[a bed]] is for [[relaxing in with a good book]]
[[a bed]] is used for [[resting and feeling better]]
[[a bed]] is used for [[taking an afternoon nap]]
